scripts.build:code: rollup src/main.js -f es -o fate-system-toolkit.js -p json -p node-resolve -m --sourcemapFile src/main.js
scripts.build:tests: cross-env NODE_ENV=test rollup src/main.js -f es -o fate-system-toolkit.js -p json -p node-resolve -m --sourcemapFile src/main.js
scripts.watch:code: rollup src/main.js -f es -o fate-system-toolkit.js -p json -p node-resolve -m --sourcemapFile src/main.js -w
